actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain deductions of school bus owner-operators shall be allowable in computing adjusted gross income.
short_title: School Bus Driver Tax Fairness Act of 2005

summary.text: School Bus Driver Tax Fairness Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow school buses owners a tax deduction from gross income for their trade or business expenses incurred while employed as drivers.

titles.title: School Bus Driver Tax Fairness Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain deductions of school bus owner-operators shall be allowable in computing adjusted gross income.
